song_name: Super Smash Bros Melee - Break the Targets
metrics_conclusion: Super Smash Bros Melee - Break the Targets has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion:
Super Smash Bros Melee - Break the Targets is written in the key of A Dorian.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the 3rd most popular key among Dorian keys and     the 32nd most popular  among all keys. The A Dorian scale is similar to the A Minor scale except that its 6th note is a half step higher (Fâ™¯).  Chord progressions in Dorian have a characteristic sound due to the major quality of the chord built on the 4th scale degree.
